text: Antonio Catricalà (7 February 1952 – 24 February 2021) was an Italian public manager, politician, professor, lawyer, and magistrate. He was born in Catanzaro, Italy. From 2011 to 2013, he was Secretary of the Council of Ministers during the Mario Monti cabinet. Catricalà died on 24 February 2021 at his Rome apartment after shooting himself, aged 69.Antonio Catricalà morto suicida, l’ex presidente Antitrust era nella sua casa a Roma, Corriere della Sera ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Suicides by firearm Category:Politicians from Calabria Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Italian academics Category:Italian lawyers
title: Antonio Catricalà
